metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20409 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Bento4 1.5.1-627. There is a heap-based buffer over-read in AP4_AvccAtom::Create in Core/Ap4AvccAtom.cpp, as demonstrated by mp42hls.

notes.Note: alexmurray> kodi-inputstream-adaptive contains an embedded copy of bento4

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
